column1: Again I turn to run but there's Corona Virus straight up zoot right in my face babbling like a sideshow. "Bro, let me leave, I'm not trying to wreck anything." I said. He laughed, "we ain't stopping till there is no more small business in the United States. Don't you get it yet?"

I had lunch with Coronavirus today to discuss the outbreak of the totally naturally occurring contagion. He was very cool, considerate, and down to be known way better on a personal level. I asked him why now? His reply? "Because the native dumbos had too much stinking bat soup."
